channel.title: Big Server Problem [help please]
channel.description: My internet went out a few hours ago, And i was still able to login to my server. Runelocus status checker says its ONLINE Basically my problem is, I shouldnt be able to login or for my server to be online if my internet is out. Something has to be wrong. how can i fix this?

item.description:

Your connecting to your localhost.

My internet went out a few hours ago, And i was still able to login to my server. Runelocus status checker says its ONLINE

Something has to be wrong. how can i fix this?
